CmpString

This component compares the string inputs [In]s1 and [In]s2 when triggered by the input event. The two strings are compared character by character and if the two strings are equal then the output [Out] is "TRUE" else it is "FALSE". The comparison is performed by the C function strcmp(), please refer to the C documentation for more information.

Ports

  • [In] s1:

    Data input.

  • [In] s2:

    Data input.

  • [Out] :

    Data output, the result of the string comparison.

  • [In] :

    Input event, compares string input [In]s1 to [In]s2 when fired.

  • [Out] :

    Output event.

Parameters

None.

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
